data.title: Precision Medical Device Manufacturing Solutions • MMT
data.meta_description: Globally recognized, vertically integrated business that serves the medical device manufacturing industry: from tip to port and beyond.
data.text:
MMT is the leading manufacturer of medical precision cutting tools known for their unmatched sharpness.

Specializing in surgical tissue coring and catheter tube punching, we offer a wide range of round, oval, and odd-form coring blade or punch styles to accommodate various applications.

Our tools are capable of creating flash-free, burr-free holes in tubing and tissue as small as .005″

Medical manufacturing requires specialty knowledge and the ability to deliver, with precision, every time. We develop material processing technologies and complimentary machine solutions that turn raw materials into real-life products. You can expect unparalleled service, support, training, applications expertise, and OEM parts – all designed to promote peak performance and operational efficiencies both now and into the future.

We want our employees to come to work each day as their authentic selves, capable of reaching their full potential in a safe and diverse environment. We work hard to protect our community and environment, and we’ve put in place some organizational structures to make sure that MMT exemplifies a healthy workplace to our employees and the world
